title.narrative: Uganda - Support to Health Sector Strategic Plan Project II (SHSSP II)

description.narrative: The objectives of the project are to contribute to the reduction of maternal mortality in selected districts and to contribute to the reduction of mental health disorders in Uganda.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
